structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: Only after the statement of goals and objectives and land use plan elements of the comprehensive plan, at least, have been adopted for the unit, KRS 100.215 and 100.324 shall govern.
law.history: Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 35, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 172, sec. 78.
